languages.text: "Рад, что мы договорились. "Соратники" будут в восторге от того, что с нами целый Вольный Торговец. Под этим соусом они слопают любое вранье".
"Glad to hear we have an agreement. Our 'comrades' will be ecstatic to have an actual Rogue Trader with us. With bait like that, they'll swallow whatever lies we feed them."
languages.original_text: "Рад, что мы договорились. "Соратники" будут в восторге от того, что с нами целый Вольный Торговец. Под этим соусом они слопают любое вранье".

traits.locale_text: "Glad to hear we have an agreement. Our 'comrades-in-arms' will be ecstatic to have an actual Rogue Trader with us. With a bait like that, they'll swallow whatever lies they're fed."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “很高兴我们之间达成了协议。如今，真正的行商浪人来到了我们的身边，我们的‘同志们’一定会欣喜若狂。有了这样的诱饵，无论我们编造什么样的谎言，他们都会信以为真。”
languages.original_text: "Glad to hear we have an agreement. Our 'comrades' will be ecstatic to have an actual Rogue Trader with us. With bait like that, they'll swallow whatever lies we feed them."

traits.locale_text: “很高兴我们之间达成了协议。如今，真正的行商浪人来到了我们的身边，我们的‘同志们’一定会欣喜若狂。有了这样的诱饵，无论我们编造什么样的谎言，他们都会信以为真。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「では、取引成立ですね。"同胞"たちも自由開拓者が仲間になれば大喜びでしょう。これほど説得力のある御方がいれば、どんな嘘でも信じてくれる」
languages.original_text: "Glad to hear we have an agreement. Our 'comrades' will be ecstatic to have an actual Rogue Trader with us. With bait like that, they'll swallow whatever lies we feed them."

traits.locale_text: 「では、取引成立ですね。"同胞"たちも自由開拓者が仲間になれば大喜びでしょう。これほど説得力のある御方がいれば、どんな嘘でも信じてくれる」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Me alegra oír que hemos llegado a un acuerdo. A nuestros "camaradas" les encantará saber que tenemos un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente de verdad entre nosotros. Con un cebo como ese, se tragarán todo lo que les contemos».
languages.original_text: "Glad to hear we have an agreement. Our 'comrades' will be ecstatic to have an actual Rogue Trader with us. With bait like that, they'll swallow whatever lies we feed them."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegra oír que hemos llegado a un acuerdo. A nuestros "camaradas" les encantará saber que tenemos un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente de verdad entre nosotros. Con un cebo como ese, se tragarán todo lo que les contemos».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "Glad to hear we have an agreement. Our 'comrades' will be ecstatic to have an actual Rogue Trader with us. With bait like that, they'll swallow whatever lies we feed them."

languages.text: « Content que vous soyez d'accord. Nos "camarades" seront ravis d'avoir {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} dans nos rangs. Avec un appât pareil, ils vont gober tout ce qu'on leur dira. »
languages.original_text: "Glad to hear we have an agreement. Our 'comrades' will be ecstatic to have an actual Rogue Trader with us. With bait like that, they'll swallow whatever lies we feed them."

traits.locale_text: « Content que vous soyez d'accord. Nos "camarades" seront ravis d'avoir {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} dans nos rangs. Avec un appât pareil, ils vont gober tout ce qu'on leur dira. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Freut mich, dass wir eine Übereinkunft haben. Unsere 'Kameraden' werden begeistert sein, dass {mf|ein echter Freihändler|eine echte Freihändlerin} an unserer Seite ist. Mit so einem Köder werden sie jede Lüge schlucken, die wir ihnen hinwerfen."
languages.original_text: "Glad to hear we have an agreement. Our 'comrades' will be ecstatic to have an actual Rogue Trader with us. With bait like that, they'll swallow whatever lies we feed them."

traits.locale_text: "Freut mich, dass wir eine Übereinkunft haben. Unsere 'Kameraden' werden begeistert sein, dass {mf|ein echter Freihändler|eine echte Freihändlerin} an unserer Seite ist. Mit so einem Köder werden sie jede Lüge schlucken, die wir ihnen hinwerfen."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Anlaşmaya vardığımıza sevindim. 'Yoldaşlarımız', gerçek bir Hür Tacir'in yanımızda olduğunu duyunca havalara uçacak. Böyle bir yemim olduğu sürece uydurduğum her yalanı yalayıp yutacaklardır."
languages.original_text: "Glad to hear we have an agreement. Our 'comrades' will be ecstatic to have an actual Rogue Trader with us. With bait like that, they'll swallow whatever lies we feed them."

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
